alert.note: Alert for Logan; McPherson; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 8:13PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Logan, northeastern McPherson and southern Thomas Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 813 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Tryon, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Logan, northeastern McPherson and southern Thomas Counties. This includes the following highways... Highway 97 between mile markers 33 and 41. Highway 83 between mile markers 129 and 131. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for north central and west central Nebraska.
